short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides real-time info about data breaches. It alerts with red or green indicators based on the severity of the breach.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Breachd! is your essential companion for maintaining online security awareness as you browse the web. It seamlessly integrates with your browser to provide real-time breach information for any website you visit. Powered by the reputable source, Have I Been Pwned (https://haveibeenpwned.com), Breachd! ensures you're always informed about potential security compromises associated with the domains you browse.

Key Features:

Automatic Breach Detection: Instantly notifies you if the website you're visiting has experienced any security breaches.

Badge Indicator: Displays a discreet badge with the number of breach events associated with the current domain.

Detailed Breach Information: Click the extension icon to explore comprehensive breach details, including breach dates, affected data types, and more.

Trusted Data Source: Data provided by Have I Been Pwned, a globally recognized authority in tracking data breaches.

Enhance your online security posture with Breachd! Stay vigilant, stay protected.
